definition: to do/to manage/to handle/to go about/to run/to set up/to deal with

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
General Office of the Central Committee of the CCP, responsible for technical and logistical matters relating to the Central Committee/abbr. to 中辦|中办[Zhong1 Ban4]
pinyin: Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Ban4 gong1 ting1

sentences.english: And before that, he was a Deputy WHCS.
sentences.chinese: 在那之前，他是白宫办公厅副主任。

sentences.english: But in my role as the Chief of Staff, that role often is a referee.
sentences.chinese: 但是作为办公厅主任，会经常扮演仲裁的角色。

sentences.english: Mike was Ronnie's deputy chief of staff, and a close family friend.
sentences.chinese: 迈克是罗尼的办公厅主任，也是我们家的至交。

sentences.english: By Friday the city clerk's office had been flooded with applications.
sentences.chinese: 直到上星期五，各种申请已经涌进了城市职员办公厅。

sentences.english: His 'Loquats' was stored in the general office of National People's Congress.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大办公厅收藏《枇杷图》一幅。

definition: Organization Department/abbr. for 中共中央組織部|中共中央组织部[Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Zu3 zhi1 bu4]
General Office of the Central Committee of the CCP, responsible for technical and logistical matters relating to the Central Committee/abbr. to 中辦|中办[Zhong1 Ban4]
pinyin: Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Ban4 gong1 ting1

definition: General Office of the Central Committee of the CCP/abbr. for 中共中央辦公廳|中共中央办公厅[Zhong1 gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Ban4 gong1 ting1]
to approve and forward/to endorse/stamp "approved for distribution"
Organization Department of the Communist Party of China Central Committee, which oversees appointments of Party members to official positions throughout China/abbr. to 中組部|中组部[Zhong1 zu3 bu4]
pinyin: Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Zu3 zhi1 bu4
